citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:25 AM on
04/15/2016. The facility entrance gate was closed and locked. APHIS ACI attempted to contact licensee by phone
and messages were left on the contact number at 9:25 AM and 10:01AM. APHIS Officials departed the facility at
10:05 AM.
Additional Inspectors
Tims Tanya, Assistant Director

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:25 AM on
04/15/2016.  The facility entrance gate was closed and locked.  APHIS ACI attempted to contact licensee by phone
and messages were left on the contact number at 9:25 AM and 10:01AM.  APHIS Officials departed the facility at
10:05 AM.
Additional Inspectors
Tims Tanya, Assistant Director
